dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset used for grapheme-to-phoneme conversion, containing a training set of 108,952 words, a validation set of 5,447 words, and a test set of 12,855 words. The dataset includes grapheme and phoneme vocabulary sizes of 27 and 39 respectively, with stress markings removed and multiple pronunciations retained.
dcterms:title: CMUDict 0.7b

dcterms:description: An internal dataset used for grapheme-to-phoneme conversion, containing 184,243 training words, 10,837 validation words, and 21,678 test words. This dataset includes uppercase and lowercase letters and stress markings.
dcterms:title: Internal English dataset
